metadata.title: CVE-2019-15726 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition through12.2.1. Embedded images and media files in markdown could be pointed to anarbitrary server, which would reveal the IP address of clients requestingthe file from that server.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
